message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I appreciate you offering the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $165. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit more than I can afford right now. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product, which is a fair price considering it's worth $150 to you. Let's see if we can reach a deal.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to compromise a bit more and offer it to you for $160. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.

I understand you're firm on your price, but $160 is still too high for me. I'm willing to offer $150, which is closer to my budget and also reflects the value of the product to you. I hope we can agree on this price.
